contentrichtext.text: {{main|ISO 3166-2}} '''ISO 3166-2:KW''' is the entry for [[Kuwait]] in [[ISO 3166-2]], part of the [[ISO 3166]] [[standardization|standard]] published by the [[International Organization for Standardization]] (ISO), which defines [[code]]s for the names of the principal [[country subdivision|subdivision]]s (e.g., [[province]]s or [[state (administrative division)|state]]s) of all [[country|countries]] coded in [[ISO 3166-1]]. Currently for Kuwait, ISO 3166-2 codes are defined for [[governorates of Kuwait|6 governorates]]. Each code consists of two parts, separated by a hyphen. The first part is <tt>KW</tt>, the [[ISO 3166-1 alpha-2]] code of Kuwait. The second part is two letters. ==Current codes== Subdivision names are listed as in the ISO 3166-2 standard published by the ISO 3166 Maintenance Agency (ISO 3166/MA). ''Click on the button in the header to sort each column.'' {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Code ! Subdivision name |- | <tt>KW-AH</tt> | [[Al Aḩmadi Governorate|Al Aḩmadi]] |- | <tt>KW-FA</tt> | [[Al Farwānīyah Governorate|Al Farwānīyah]] |- | <tt>KW-JA</tt> | [[Al Jahrah Governorate|Al Jahrā’]] |- | <tt>KW-KU</tt> | [[Al Kuwayt Governorate|Al Kuwayt (Al ٰĀşimah)]] |- | <tt>KW-HA</tt> | {{sort|Hawallī|[[Ḩawallī Governorate|Ḩawallī]]}} |- | <tt>KW-MU</tt> | [[Mubārak al Kabīr Governorate|Mubārak al Kabīr]] |} ==Changes== The following changes to the entry have been announced in newsletters by the ISO 3166/MA since the first publication of ISO 3166-2 in 1998: {| class="wikitable" |- ! Edition/Newsletter ! Date issued ! Description of change in newsletter ! Code/Subdivision change |- | id="II" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_catalogue/catalogue_tc/catalogue_detail.htm?csnumber=39718 {{nowrap|ISO 3166-2:2007}}] | {{nowrap|2007-12-13}} | ''Second edition of ISO 3166-2 (this change was not announced in a newsletter)''<ref>{{cite web| url=http://www.statoids.com/n0801.html| title=Statoid Newsletter January 2008| publisher=Statoids.com}}</ref> | style=white-space:nowrap | '''Subdivisions added:'''<br /> <tt>KW-MU</tt> [[Mubārak al Kabīr Governorate|Mubārak al Kabīr]] |- | id="II-3" | [http://www.iso.org/iso/iso_3166-2_newsletter_ii-3_2011-12-13.pdf {{nowrap|Newsletter II-3}}] | {{nowrap|2011-12-13}}<br /> ''(corrected<br /> {{nowrap|2011-12-15}})'' | Administrative name update and list source update. | |} ==See also== * [[Subdivisions of Kuwait]] * [[List of FIPS region codes (J-L)#KU: Kuwait|FIPS region codes of Kuwait]] ==References== <references /> ==External links== * [http://www.statoids.com/ukw.html Governorates of Kuwait], Statoids.com {{ISO 3166}} [[Category:ISO 3166|2:KW]] [[Category:Governorates of Kuwait|*ISO 3166-2]] [[Category:Kuwait-related lists]]
